Dear {client_name},

We are sending you an offer for plumbing installation: {project_name}.

Plumbing work value: {total_price}
Completion time: {deadline}

The offer includes:
• Installation design
• Delivery of materials and fittings
• Installation works
• Leak tests and installation acceptance

We only use proven materials from renowned manufacturers. We provide a warranty for the work performed.

You will find a detailed cost estimate in the attached document.

Please contact us to arrange details.

Best regards,
{company_name}
Phone: {company_phone}

• Electrical system design

All work is performed by qualified personnel using certified materials. We guarantee compliance with safety regulations.

Technical details and cost estimate in the attached PDF.

We are at your disposal.

Best regards,
{company_name}
Phone: {company_phone}

faq.sectionSubtitle: Can't find an answer? Write to kontakt@majster.ai
faq.q1: Do I need to sign a contract?
faq.a1: No. You get 30 days free to try the app with no credit card required. After that you can choose one of our paid plans or cancel anytime.
faq.a2: Data is protected and access is controlled. You can manage permissions and know who has access to what information.
faq.q3: Does the app work on mobile?
faq.a3: Yes, the app is fully optimized for mobile devices. You can use it on any smartphone with a web browser.
faq.q4: How long is the free access?
faq.a4: The free plan is free for 30 days. After that you can choose a paid plan suited to your needs.
faq.q5: What languages does the app support?
faq.a5: The app supports three languages: Polish, English and Ukrainian. You can change the language in settings at any time.
